body: Hmm. Actually, can this be documented somewhere? Also, according to the [cudnn doc](https://docs.nvidia.com/deeplearning/sdk/cudnn-developer-guide/index.html#reproducibility), the non-determinism happens during backward pass. However in my case it happens in the forward pass. Any thoughts?
